byline.contributor: Joshua Jamerson and Colleen Wright contributed reporting.
byline.original: By AL BAKER and J. DAVID GOODMAN

abstract: New York Police Officer Filippo Gugliara fatally shoots man near Brighton Beach, Brooklyn, subway station after man attacks him with knife, slashing his neck; assailant's name is not immediately released.
lead_paragraph: Police officials said Officer Filippo Gugliara had been slashed at the base of his neck on his collarbone at a Q train station in Brighton Beach before firing at the 58-year-old attacker.

headline.main: Officer Fatally Shoots a Man Who Slashed Him in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Officer Fatally Shoots a Man Who Slashed Him in Brooklyn

snippet: Police officials said Officer Filippo Gugliara had been slashed at the base of his neck on his collarbone at a Q train station in Brighton Beach before firing at the 58-year-old attacker.
